name: Motorbike Dubai City Driving Simultor 3D 2015: Expensive motorbikes street racing by rich driver
name_original: Motorbike Dubai City Driving Simultor 3D 2015: Expensive motorbikes street racing by rich driver
description:
Dubai City Driving Simulator 3D is a luxury sport motorbikes simulator game. If you enjoy driving expensive motorbikes like this driving simulator is for you. You will race through the streets of Dubai City like rich owners of expensive motors. While driving you will explore the streets without any traffic, fast roads, and highways of great speed. You have a great chance to practice before illegal racing.
